alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 2:21PM EDT until June 11 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winnsboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Fairfield Elementary School, Bell Town Fire Station, White Oak, Mitford, Fairfield County Detention Center, Faith Christian School and Winnsboro Mills. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 36 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Wateree move away from the water and take shelter!
